item.title: All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies
item.description:
All the adults colouring is leading to huge sales for pencil companies

SYDNEY, Australia - So many adults are spending their days colouring in the lines, pencil companies are struggling to cope with the demand for coloured pencils and felt tip pens. Staedtler , the German company which produces felt tip pens and coloured pencils, has seen significant growth in Australia as adults get obsessed with the mindful trend.

item.title: Winners of the 2015 iPhone Photography Awards Announced
item.description:
Winners of the 2015 iPhone Photography Awards Announced

NEW YORK - June 15, 2015 - The iPhone Photography Awards™ (IPPAWARDS) is proud to announce the winners of the 8th Annual Awards. They were selected from thousands of entries submitted by iPhone photographers from 120 countries around the world.

item.title: Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open
item.description:
Discussing Coffee with Marco Lavazza at the US Open

It's been a big year for Lavazza. Not only is it their 120th anniversary, they've also partnered with the Italian Pavillon at the World Exposition Milan 2015 and expanded their tennis partnerships to include a sponsorship of the US Open.

item.title: Portraits of Dogs as They Shake Off Water
item.description:
Portraits of Dogs as They Shake Off Water

For her series " Shake", pet photographer Carli Davidson photographed curious portraits of dogs shaking off water. Use a fast shutter speed and you can capture all kinds of strange expressions on your dog's face. You can find the rest of the photographs in the series here.

item.title: Five Four + Marvel Collection
item.description:
Five Four + Marvel Collection

Some comic book apparel can end up juvenile, but the new Five Four collaboration with Marvel is anything but. In celebration of the impending release of Avengers: Age of Ultron, the Five Four subscription menswear service finds subtlety in the generally loud graphic medium by using Marvel's famous roster of superheroes to inspire its April capsule.

item.title: Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.
item.description:
Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.

The Düsseldorf photographer Thomas Ruff is having his day in the sun, with the Art Gallery of Ontario's 'Object Relations', a major solo show, opening this month. Closer to home, Chelsea's David Zwirner Gallery is celebrating Ruff's latest series of work.

item.title: How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money
item.description:
How to Book Better Airbnbs for Less Money

How to successfully book your first-choice listings and get them for cheaper.

item.title: Projections in the Forest
item.description:
Projections in the Forest

Behind the scenes: http://vimeo.com/3hund/behindthescenes The projection mapping "bioluminescent forest" is made by artists Friedrich van Schoor and Tarek Mawad. The artists spent six weeks in the forest fascinated by the silence and natural occurrences in nature, especially the phenomenon "bioluminescence".

item.title: 7 Amazing Photos To Celebrate National Parks Week - Moment
item.description:
7 Amazing Photos To Celebrate National Parks Week - Moment

It's National Parks Week! This year is a big one to celebrate as the National Park Service celebrates its 100th birthday! That's 100 years of road trips out west, swimming in lakes, climbing mountains, sharing the roadways with roaming wildlife and camping with friends and family.
